channel.title: Lunar
channel.description: So I completed the quest a year ago on one of my accounts and now I've completely forgot where to go to switch the book. Anyone know? I think it's moonclan island but when I go I get kicked out because I need a seal? Thanks

item.title: Lunar
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:6, topic:318790”][quote author=cows_be_sacred link=topic=415252.msg3056193#msg3056193 date=1260492092]
So I completed the quest a year ago on one of my accounts and now I’ve completely forgot where to go
to switch the book. Anyone know? I think it’s moonclan island but when I go I get kicked out because I
need a seal? Thanks

[/quote]
Translation: I bought an account that had the lunar quest complete and I don’t know how to get to lunar isle to change my spell book. =][/quote]
No I have had many accounts in the past and tons given to me by friends i have 2 in the level 80-90 range and then 1 that’s my main. And I have tons of accounts not worth mentioning. You are right about one part though, this was my friends account and already had lunar, I just had no idea how to go to lunar island.

bootnecklad:

FUCK SAKE, can you please make one thread, then ask all your questions on that.

Naw.

Read full topic

i went to the agility pyramid when i started playing again to swap to ancients

item.title: Lunar
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

Frell:

Lunar island, talk to the bitch at the astral altar.

fail, you click the alter noob l2guidenoobs!

jking

yh, or tele to a house in relleka once on the island head south pass the fat trolls.

Read full topic

item.title: Lunar
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“cows_be_sacred, post:3, topic:318790”][quote author=Frell link=topic=415252.msg3056207#msg3056207 date=1260493013]
Lunar island, talk to the bitch at the astral altar.
[/quote]
So how do I get there? There’s no tele option[/quote]
Relleka, use the boat and bring a seal of passage.

go to zybez.net and read the part of the quest guide that tells you how to get there.

Read full topic
